deployment_url.description: URL of the Credal API deployment that is the destination

api_token.description: API token used to send data to a Credal deployment.

uploader_email.description: If not specified, the data will be uploaded to the user of the token owner.

organization_id.description: Can only be specified by tokens that have the authority to upload on behalf of other organizations. If not specified, the data will be uploaded to the organization of the token owner.

text_fields.description: Fields that should be embedded and indexed in vector store.

metadata_fields.description: Fields that should be added as metadata for each indexed document.

document_name_field.description: Fields to use to name the document.

document_id_field.description: Fields to use for the primary key for this document in the source system.

document_url_field.description: Field that stores the link to this document in the source system.

source_updated_timestamp_field.description: Field that represents when this document was updated in the source system. If this is specified and the document has already been uploaded, the document will only be updated if the source_updated_timestamp_field is newer than the last time the document was uploaded.

collection_id.description: Optional collection id if you want to upload the documents to a specific collection in Credal.
